regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a reporting mechanism that generates operational and statistical reports based on the recorded alarm events.

regen.absent_element: condition for detection of an alarm request
regen.new_specification: The system shall monitor and identify any initial triggers from thermostats or related subsystems that require an alarm request.

regen.absent_element: notification to operators beyond beeping sounds
regen.new_specification: The system shall send a visual alert to the operator's terminal each time an alarm condition is detected, in addition to audio signals.

label: This series of beeps shall continue until the supervisor manually resets the alarm through the supervisor's interface window.
